pr_title: Fix handling of negative offsets for time w/ tz

timeline.message: Add tests for negative offsets for timestamp w/ tz

timeline.bodyText: we should test timezone_hour too, as the function is not hidden
timeline.author: findepi
findepi
findepi

timeline.message:
Fix handling of negative offsets for time w/ tz

There were two issues:
* The parsing logic had a deficiency that prevented it from handling offsets of the
  shape -00:XX. The sign was being lost
* The conversion from offset hour and offset minute to offset minutes was incorrect.
  It was not calculating a proper negative offset because it was adding positive minutes
  (towards 0) in the case of a negative offset.
